name: Escape the Playbox
description:
Escape the Playbox was a project developed in GameMaker with four levels designed to be the rooms of three NPCs who're doing all in their power to prevent you, the protagonist, from getting out.

Arm yourself with a slingshot and blast away at your enemies with your marbles. You're going to have to put up a fight to get away from all these zany characters. Talk to them to find out where you are, and, for your sake, try not to piss them off.

(Background art and background music do not belong to me.)
(Banner and background photo by rawpixel on Unsplash.)
